channel.title: Pidgin question
channel.description: I had a question regarding pidgin, I know it says everything is routed through tor so by default if I'm using pidgin with whonix workstation, would my chat be routed through tor aswell? This is under the assumption I have OTR and Private is green. I ask this because I wanted to know if theres some weird thing that prevents it.

item.title: Pidgin question
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
OTR is unrelated. Everything goes through Tor.

Read full topic
